author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

This PR reverts commit f5ccf71febaad904739fae9a443bb5877ed43237 that was added in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/49299. This workaround was not useful in the end. For more details see https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/49365 and https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/49298.

Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1784

#### PR validation:

None
title: Revert "RNTuple requires MEtoEDM<long> have a dictionary"
